newsitem.title: USA: Dynamotion/ATI sells ATI product line.
newsitem.headline: Dynamotion/ATI sells ATI product line.

text.p: Dynamotion/ATI Corp said on Friday it had sold the assets of its ATI router product line.
The company said in a statement that it would operate solely under the name Dynamotion.
The ATI product line was sold to a newly formed corporation for about $2 million. The new company will operate under the name Advanced Technology Industries, or ATI, and is based in Carlstadt, N.J.
Along with all assets of the ATI line, Dynamotion sold the right to the ATI name.

Dynamotion chairman and chief executive Jon R. Hopper said, "The sale of ATI is a positive move for Dynamotion. We have spent the last year cleaning up the company and attempting to re-focus our resources.
